title: The Great Gatsby
summary: This story revolves around the love affair between Jay Gatsby and Daisy Buchanan. The narrative unfolds through conversations among characters like Jordan Baker, Nick Carraw, Tom Buchanan, and many more. It delves into themes of wealth, social class, and love.

character_list.name: Nick Carrow
character_list.desc: The narrator who describes the events from his perspective.

character_list.name: Jay Gatsby
character_list.desc: A mysterious man who has bought a mansion next to Daisy Buchanan’s house in order to see her again.

character_list.name: Daisy Buchanan
character_list.desc: The narrator's cousin, already married and with children. She is the love interest of Gatsby.

character_list.name: Tom Buchanan
character_list.desc: A wealthy man who has a mistress named Myrtle Wilson.

character_list.name: Jordan Baker
character_list.desc: A tennis player who tells a story about her encounter with Gatsby and his reputation as a womanizer.
